spell.name: Sculpt Ice
entries: You choose an empty space or an area of ice that you can see within range and that fits within a 5-foot cube. You manipulate it in one of the following ways:
<li> Create a sculpture or a block of thin ice within a 5-foot cube. It will not melt because of any non-magical means, such as hot climate or fire, yet it will melt automatically after an hour.
<li> You can shape up to 5-feet of ice simultaneously as you want. These changes occur slowly as you concentrate on shaping the ice.
<li> You change the ice's color or opacity. This starts from a point you're touching and slowly reaches out to the rest of the surface. This lasts for up to an hour.
<li> You can melt or sublime the ice in a 5-foot cube, if sublimed, the gas produced is not enough to obscure an area.

spell.name: Exhale Gas
entries: You exhale ( or create ) a cloud of either smoke, fog or dust that can cover up to a 10-foot radius that lightly obscure the area.
The fog or smoke shapes itself to fill in corners, You can manipulate the gas you created in one of the following ways:
<li> Manipulate the gas to move or convey simple shapes and forms..
<li> You can change the smell or color of the gas you create.
<li> You can manipulate the gas you create to fly towards one creature's eyes. They must make a constitution saving throw or be blinded until your next turn.
